  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120460</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120460</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kinetična teorija, povezave med mikroskopskim in makroskopskim</string>
            <string language="en">Kinetic Theory, Microscopic and Macroscopic Connections</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinetische Theorie-, mikroskopische und 
makroskopischeanschlüsse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Connexions de théorie, microscopiques et 
macroscopiques cinétiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conexões cinéticas da teoria, as microscópicas
e as macroscópicas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Collegamenti microscopici e macroscopici cinetici
di teoria,</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κινητική θεωρία, μικροσκοπικές και μακροσκοπικές 
συνδέσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conexiones cinéticas de la teoría, 
microscópicas y macroscópicas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Demonstracije povezave med mikroskopskim svetom atomov in zunanje makroskopske temperature na osnovi kinetične energije in gibalne količine.</string>
            <string language="en">Relation between microscopic world of atoms and macroscopic world temperature described with kinetic energy and momentum.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">temperatura</string>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinetična energija</string>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relation zwischen mikroskopischer Welt der Atome 
und der makroskopischen Welttemperatur beschrieben mit kinetischer 
Energie und Momentum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Relation entre le monde microscopique des atomes 
et la température macroscopique du monde décrite avec de l'énergie 
et l'élan cinétiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relação entre o mundo microscópico dos átomos
e a temperatura macroscópica do mundo descrita com energia e momentum
cinéticos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rapporto fra il mondo microscopico degli atomi e 
la temperatura macroscopica del mondo descritta con energia e 
quantità di moto cinetiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέση μεταξύ του μικροσκοπικού κόσμου των ατόμων και 
της μακροσκοπικής παγκόσμιας θερμοκρασίας που περιγράφεται με την 
κινητική ενέργεια και την ορμή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Relación entre el mundo microscópico de átomos
y la temperatura macroscópica del mundo descrita con energía e 
ímpetu cinéticos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la température</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμοκρασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía cinética</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
